comments.html: Sorry. Little typo in the text. MED is a non-transitive attribute, not a transitive. I think is worth fixing as many people trust your posts more than RFCs ;-)
comments.name: Aleksei

comments.html:
And then, to make things worse there's for instance IOSXR/JUNOS behaving by default as if they had the cisco-knob 'bgp deterministic med' configured while the IOSXE/IOS doesn't by default and it needs to have the cisco-knob 'bgp deterministic med' to be explicitly configured in order to behave that way ....

Cheers/Ciao

Andrea
comments.name: Andrea Di Donato
